title: "Magician"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shine your light through someone's window. They'll be blinded and will be roleblocked.
- Shine your light right at your front door. Your visitors will be blinded and will be roleblocked. 3 uses.
- With the Necronomicon, you can use a 100,000 lumen flashlight to turn on the sun, immediately ending the night for a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Necronomicon** - You get the Necronomicon on Night 3. There is only one Necronomicon - if other Anything members would receive the Necronomicon, it is randomized on who gets it.
- Ending the night for a player means their ability is immediately processed and abilities used on them are immediately processed. If more abilities are used on them, they also are immediately processed, but cannot affect abilities already processed (a Doctor cannot save someone who is already dead).

desc:
Post 3569
*What do you mean this is a flashlight?! You just can't see true magic!*
